short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the name of Mahoyaku's favourite brewer to Sherlock!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changes the name of Mahoyaku's favourite brewer to Sherlock!
 	
* Please note that this add-on can only replace text mentions of Sherlock's canon name. As such, some mentions of his canon name may slip through the cracks, such as images and alternative spellings.
